DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: year_specific_covariates
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Covariates year-specific ((n-1)year x n year-specific covariates). LRS = little rainy season, corresponds to the amount of water felt during the little rainy season (between march and april); RS = rainy season, corresponds to the amount of water felt during the rainy season (between march and the start of the corresponding visit).
